snippet: Mr. Crystal, who was born and raised in Long Beach, N.Y., is starring in commercials that aim to attract more people to visit the city for a day or a weekend.
abstract: Actor Billy Crystal, who was born and raised in Long Beach, NY, which was hit hard by Hurricane Sandy, is starring in commercials aiming to attract more people to visit the beach haven for a day or a weekend.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Crystal, who was born and raised in Long Beach, N.Y., is starring in commercials that aim to attract more people to visit the city for a day or a weekend.

headline.main: On Long Island, Billy Crystal Assists Storm-Struck Hometown
headline.print_headline: Favorite Son Helps a Storm-Battered Town
